channel.title: Combined Politepol Feed
channel.description: Merged feed from multiple Politepol sources

item.title: 'Condemnable, criminal attack': How the world is reacting to US strikes and capture of Maduro
Venezuela’s Nicolas Maduro captured by US Delta Force: What is this specialised army unit?
Timeline: How US ramped up pressure on Venezuela before capturing Maduro
Why did the US strike Venezuela and capture its President Nicolas Maduro?
Maduro urges people to rise up against US assault. How does Venezuela’s military stack up?
Explosions heard in Venezuela’s Caracas. Is the US behind the blasts? What does Maduro say?
Why New Delhi must master narrative warfare against US-China manoeuvres
item.description: External powers like the US and China are constantly trying to script India's relationships to fit their own visions of the world order, and this is the latest test of whether India can assert its own agency

item.title: Bangladesh: How Yunus regime’s mobocracy has weaponised the persecution of minorities
item.description: By refusing to acknowledge the communal nature of the violence, the Yunus administration sent a clear signal: mobs would not be restrained

item.title: INSV Kaundinya: India’s push towards maritime decolonisation, reclaiming civilisational legacy
item.description: INSV Kaundinya’s maiden overseas voyage reclaims India’s centuries-old maritime legacy, challenging colonial narratives that painted the subcontinent as land-bound

item.title: India’s Bangladesh policy must prioritise strategic restraint, diversified diplomacy
item.description: The coming months are critical for India to recalibrate its Bangladesh policy, emphasising engagement with moderate political actors and addressing security concerns to avert a deeper strategic setback

item.title: Sheikh Hasina’s trial: My argument was misread
item.description: At no point did I suggest that procedural criticism invalidates the moral or legal responsibility established by the tribunal’s findings

item.title: India and Bangladesh: Whose ‘chicken neck’, whose vulnerabilities?
item.description: As India plays mature diplomacy, subtle signals are being sent
